abstract: Amazon’s new iPhone app includes an “experimental” feature called Amazon Remembers that is designed to funnel sales from the offline world to the Internet.
snippet: Amazon’s new iPhone app includes an “experimental” feature called Amazon Remembers that is designed to funnel sales from the offline world to the Internet.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com will join the iPhone frenzy on Wednesday with a new application available free for download through Apple’s App Store.

headline.main: Amazon.com Invades the Apple App Store
